price: 62. « Et pourquoi, diront-ils, ne voyons-nous pas des hommes que nous tenions pour mauvais ?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā naʿudduhum mina al-ashrāri
